Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a problem of people needing to communicate over long distances.
The student can illustrate a device that uses sound to solve the problem of long-distance communication.
The student can show how the device uses string connected to cups to send and receive information.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing how the sound travels through the string from one student to the other.
The student can depict how communication over distances helps people in their drawing.
